section.name: Powered By Cayenne
section.p: If your site or project uses Cayenne as its Object-Relational engine, please drop a note to cayenne-user list or directly to "andrus at objectstyle.org". We are in the process of building success stories page where this information will be included. Here is an incomplete list of sites that use Cayenne:

After the initial trial of Cayenne in October 2002, NHL switched all their public applications running at NHL.com to use Cayenne. With the help from ObjectStyle and Central Park Software the site was successfully launched to production. Currently applications receive more than 5 million hits a day.

subsection.name: Cayenne Badges
subsection.p: Also we developed a few web badges to enable you to endorse Cayenne technology. Help us to spread the word and promote Cayenne. If your site or project uses Cayenne, you may put one of the following badges on the site. Badge should be configured as an active link to Cayenne website: http://objectstyle.org/cayenne/
